idea:
White Owl Brewery Private Limited ('WOBPL/ 'The Company') is a closely held private limited company engaged in the business of manufacturing, packaging, distributing, marketing and retailing of beverages, including but not limited to craft beer as well as branded merchandize under various brand names, including but not limited to 'White Owl’ (‘WO’) which is a registered trademark of the Company.

The Company currently manufactures and packages premium beer at a contracted facility in Bhopal in Bottles and Cans and distributes and markets the same at over 1,500+ Restaurants, Bars & Retail Stores across Mumbai, Pune, Goa, Bengaluru& Delhi with several new geographies in the pipeline.
name: WHITE OWL BREWERY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We at ULTRA FINE CHEM & INST  would take this  opportunity to introduce ourselves as an Importer & Distributor for prominent international brands of Laboratory Chemicals and Instruments for the service to Scientific community . 

ULTRA FINE CHEM & INST was started in November 2014 with a team of four talented entrepreneur with rich cumulative  experience of over more than five decades in similar field with MERCK & AVANTOR PERFORMANCE MATERIALS.
With our knowledge pool we are able to Cater to the various requirements of Chemicals & instruments across Pharma Industries & Research Institutes throughout the length and breadth of the country.
During the short span of 5 years we scaled up our service levels & created employment opportunity .We are sure ,our meticulous planning and implementation will help us scale newer heights in business in terms of growth and revenue. Our Product lines includes 
• Labscan /Biosolve (GC /HPLC/LCMS/ULCMS-solvents)
• Biosolve-GC Standards.
• SENSOREX (USA)-pH BUFFERS ELECTRODES).
. DWK-range of Glass wares
• Accustandard range of Organic and Inorganic Standards.
• Inorganic –Ventures –USA( range of Standards ICP/AAS ).
• Saint Gobain range of Septa & vials-for HPLC & GC).
• Brand(GERMANY) -Liquid Handling Systems & VACCUM PUMP
• Equipments & Instruments
• Pharma impurities.

We request your esteemed self to support us as a start up firm so that we could contribute to the growth and development of the nation.
name: ULTRA FINE CHEM & INST

idea:
Hi,

I am Nitin Pandey , Having 13 Years Experience in insurance Broking Industry .

I have Acquired the Instapolicy On June 2019 And Within the 6 Month Of Time Now We are having Offline Presence in Almost 60% Area of entire country .

7 Branch Across India 500 POS Covering 273 Cities .

Within 6 Month we have launched our dynamic Online Insurance Portal And Mobile App where all the POS and Direct Client Can Issue the Policy Instantly .

Development of online portal and App is not possible for everyone to launch in 3 Month of time .

We Did 30 Cr Insurance Premium in 6 Month .

Team Strength Is 100 Employees .

We Are Targeting 150 Cr. Premium In Next FY Along with 20 More Branches , And PAN India Presence , Specially in tier 2, 3 , 4 cities and There is no requirement of higher education to start business so our company can give the jobs of around 5000 youngsters those are having the capability to do something but they are helpless due to less education .

Digital India Will be involve as technology will play main role on this as there is no requirement of any investment to start the business of insurance .

Also Targeting 25000 Online Policies Issued through Our Online Portal www.insta-policy.com
name: Instapolicy Insurance Broking Pvt Ltf

idea:
Annapurna Agro Estates, incorporated in 2015, is fast emerging premier agro real-estate company. It is differentiated due to its scale, spread, quality of assets and partnerships. The company business model is to blend its sharp financial management skills with proven on-ground experience of acquisition, development and ownership to create superior returns for its shareholders. With the management strength in obtaining statutory approvals, execution capabilities, the company has tremendous potential to rapidly expand its portfolio across agriculture business sectors.


By partnering with the best of the worlds, we continuously keep ourselves abreast with changing global and national trends. In order to achieve the scalability required to undertake large developments, we leverage competencies to leading international and domestic consultants with proven experience of certainty in the areas of agriculture business sectors.


Annapurna Agro Estates is managed by the best in class & multi-disciplinary management team. Strong institutional sponsorship provides the company highest level of corporate governance and thought leadership. Annapurna Agro Estates leadership has proven experience of investments making it one of the most engaged asset owner. 


Annapurna Agro Estates works on whole farm management system which aims to deliver sustainable agriculture. It is a dynamic approach which can be applied to any farming system around the world. It involves attention to detail and continuous improvement in all areas of a farming business through informed management processes. Integrated Farming combines the best of modern tools and technologies with traditional practices according to a given site and situation. Annapurna Agro Estates employs Lean Techniques to drive efficiency on agriculture projects. These techniques eliminate redundancy and waste, enhance collaboration and improve outputs.


Annapurna Agro Estates uses local/ rural employment as a tool for social security and poverty alleviation and also focuses on rural development as a tool for improving the quality of life and economic well-being of people living in isolated and sparsely populated rural areas.


Annapurna Agro Estates is the brainchild of Amol Reddiwar with diverse and intensive experience of over two decades in healthcare, hospitality and real estate projects execution and development value chain and long-standing relationships in India.


People are the most valuable asset at Annapurna Agro Estates, they are the bedrock on which our growth and success stands - they are the pillars of strength that makes us who we are.


The management team comprises of highly-motivated, industry and domain experts, who have been in business for over two decades now. They closely drive and lead their functions infusing impetus, passion, energy and growth for their teams and the organization at large. With commitment to our values, they ensure continued credence in all we do and deliver.
name: ANNAPURNA AGRO ESTATES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are into apparel manufacturing and our key focus in on gym wear and organic clothing line, but the main issue with is funding, As India market is gaining good traction for organic clothing and specific brand has captured this segment so there is wide scope for it and we provide 100% customization( fitting and printing). We have a strong team who has great experience in this field
